function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of reticulated air with a mandated percentage of fresh air","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission due to recirculation of air","Mitigation":"Increase the use of fresh external air or install HEPA filters","Technologies":"HEPA filters, ventilation systems","People":"Occupants of enclosed spaces","Owner":"Building owners, property managers"},{"Description":"Lack of separate air cycles for communal and private spaces","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission between communal and private spaces","Mitigation":"Design separate air cycles for communal and private spaces","Technologies":"HVAC design, air circulation planning","People":"Occupants of communal and private spaces","Owner":"Architects, building designers, engineers"},{"Description":"Designing spaces without consideration for self-isolation","Impact":"Potential inability to isolate individuals in case of contagious disease outbreaks","Mitigation":"Design spaces and ventilation systems to accommodate self-isolation areas","Technologies":"Ventilation system, compartmentalization through doors","People":"Occupants of living and working spaces","Owner":"Architects, building designers, property managers"}]}
